mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(id, goodsName, manufacturer, expiryDt, price, contact, address, usableCapacity, explanation, status, writeDt, modifyDt, picture) VALUE (#{id}, #{goodsName}, #{manufacturer}, #{expiryDt}, #{price}, #{contact}, #{address}, #{usableCapacity}, #{explanation}, #{status}, #{writeDt}, #{modifyDt}, #{picture})
